comments:
3.3 RC4 with WTP 2.0 RC2

This happend while a rename refactoring of a package including all sub packages. The rename factoring was completely broken afterwards. Some classes were successfully updated while others were not.

Note, there is another problem for renaming the packages. I've opened bug 192615. However, the NPE still needs to be investigated by WTP.
Added workaround to JSPSearchScope.  As it is only partially supported in 2.0, that's all I can do.
